param.name: Report Timeout
param.desc: Timeout threshold to report Entity error

param.name: Default Monitoring -- Hardware
param.desc: Additional default entities to monitor in Hardware profile

param.name: Maximum Consecutive Transitions
param.desc: Maximum number of consecutive transitions before starting to ignore

param.name: Convert Height to Geoid Height
param.desc: Convert WGS84 height to geoid height (mean sea level) height

param.name: Compute Progress
param.desc: True if plan progress should be computed

param.name: Fuel Prediction
param.desc: True if plan's fuel prediction should be computed

param.name: Perform Calibration
param.desc: True if calibration should be performed at all

param.name: Abort On Failed Activation
param.desc: Abort when a payload fails to activate

param.name: StationKeeping Speed in RPM
param.desc: Speed in RPM for the station keeping

param.name: IMU Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the IMU for fuel prediction

param.name: Plan Generator Entity Label
param.desc: Entity label of the Plan Generator

param.name: Dive depth
param.desc: Depth to dive in response to 'dive' command

param.name: Traveling depth
param.desc: Depth to use when traveling (Goto maneuvers)

param.name: Dive seconds
param.desc: Time to be under water in response to 'dive' command (seconds)

param.name: Loiter radius
param.desc: Radius of generated loiter and station keeping maneuvers

param.name: RPM Speed
param.desc: Speed in RPMs to be used in the generated maneuvers

param.name: Generate At Boot
param.desc: Set of commands for plans to generate at boot

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Size A
param.desc: Length to stern from the located AIS [m]

param.name: Size B
param.desc: Length to bow from the located AIS [m]

param.name: Size C
param.desc: Length to port from the located AIS [m]

param.name: Size D
param.desc: Length to starboard from the located AIS [m]

param.name: Execution Frequency
param.desc: Frequency at which task is executed

param.name: Vital Entities
param.desc: Relevant entities that are always considered regardless of ignoring errors during plan execution

param.name: Allows External Control
param.desc: Allow for the vehicle to be externally controlled

param.name: Maneuver Handling Timeout
param.desc: Timeout for starting or stopping a maneuver

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Transports
param.default: Chlorophyll, CompassHeading, Conductivity, CpuUsage, Current, Depth, Distance, EntityState, EstimatedFreq, Fluorescein, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, LblConfig, LblRange, LblRangeAcceptance, Phycocyanin, Phycoerythrin, Power, PowerChannelState, Pressure, RhodamineDye, RSSI, Rpm, Salinity, SoundSpeed, StorageUsage, Temperature, Turbidity, Voltage, PH, Redox

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk

param.name: Transports
param.default: Abort, Acceleration, AcousticBackscatter, AisStaticInfo, EntityList, AngularVelocity, Announce, CompassHeading, Conductivity, ControlLoops, ControlParcel, Correlation, CpuUsage, Current, CurrentProfile, CurrentProfileCell, CurrentVelocity, DataSanity, Depth, DesiredControl, DesiredZ, DesiredHeading, DesiredHeadingRate, DesiredPath, DesiredPitch, DesiredSpeed, DesiredVelocity, DevDataBinary, DevDataText, Distance, EmergencyControl, EmergencyControlState, EstimatedFreq, EntityActivationState, EntityList, EntityMonitoringState, EntityParameters, EntityState, EstimatedState, EstimatedStreamVelocity, EulerAngles, EulerAnglesDelta, FollowRefState, FuelLevel, GpsFix, GpsFixRejection, GroundVelocity, Heartbeat, IridiumMsgRx, IridiumMsgTx, IridiumTxStatus, LogBookEntry, ManeuverControlState, MagneticField, PathControlState, PeekDesiredPath, PeekManeuver, PlanSpecification, PlanControl, PlanControlState, PlanDB, PathControlState, PopEntityParameters, Power, PowerChannelControl, PowerChannelState, PowerSettings, PushEntityParameters, Pressure, QueryEntityParameters, Reference, RelativeWind, RemoteActions, RemoteActionsRequest, RemoteSensorInfo, RemoteState, Rpm, RSSI, Salinity, SaveEntityParameters, SetEntityParameters, ServoPosition, SetServoPosition, SetThrusterActuation, SimulatedState, StopManeuver, Teleoperation, TeleoperationDone, Temperature, TransmissionRequest, TransmissionStatus, VehicleCommand, VehicleMedium, VehicleState, VehicleState, VesselWind, Voltage, WaterDensity, WaterVelocity

param.name: Local Port
param.desc: Local UDP port to listen on

param.name: Static Destinations
param.desc: List of <IPv4>:<Port> destinations that will always receive outgoing messages

param.name: Rate Limiters
param.default: AlignmentState:0.5, CpuUsage:0.2, Distance:0.2, EntityState:1, EstimatedState:2, EulerAngles:1, FuelLevel:0.1, Rpm:1, SetServoPosition:1, SimulatedState:0.5, StorageUsage:0.05, Voltage:0.1, Acceleration:1, AngularVelocity:1

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.name: Underwater Communications
param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated

param.name: Transports
param.default: Acceleration, AcousticBackscatter, AngularVelocity, AisStaticInfo, AlignmentState, CompassHeading, Correlation, CpuUsage, Current, CurrentProfile, CurrentProfileCell, CurrentVelocity, DesiredHeading, DesiredSpeed, DevCalibrationControl, DevCalibrationState, Distance, EntityList, EntityParameters, EntityState, EstimatedFreq, EstimatedState, EulerAngles, FollowRefState, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, IridiumMsgRx, IridiumMsgTx, IridiumTxStatus, LogBookEntry, LogBookControl, MagneticField, OperationalLimits, PathControlState, PlanControl, PlanControlState, PlanDB, PlanGeneration, Power, PowerSettings, RelativeWind, RemoteActions, RemoteActionsRequest, RemoteSensorInfo, Rpm, RSSI, ServoPosition, SetServoPosition, SetThrusterActuation, SimulatedState, StorageUsage, Teleoperation, TeleoperationDone, TransmissionRequest, TransmissionStatus, TrexObservation, TrexOperation, TrexToken, TrexPlan, VehicleMedium, VehicleState, VesselWind, Voltage

param.name: Always Transmitted Messages
param.desc: List of messages that will always be transmitted disregarding communication limitations

param.name: Local Messages Only
param.desc: Only transmit messsages from local system.

param.name: Custom Service Type
param.desc: Optional custom service type (imc+udp+<Custom Service Type>), empty entry gives default service (imc+udp)
